payload.name: bare-metal-provisioning
payload.title: Bare metal provisioning: you need a substrate API (BMC/Redfish/PXE/golden images)
payload.formal: if you own hardware, provisioning is control theory + security.
payload.apm2_mapping: Phase‑4/5 require fleet control. Define a rack substrate API early, or you’ll re-invent cloud primitives badly.
